title: BREAKING: Barbara Walters, Legendary ABC News Journalist, Dies
description: Barbara Walters, a journalist at ABC News who helped forge the way for women to appear on news broadcasts, has died. She was 93 years old. title: ICE Deportations Lag Another Year As Agents Deployed To Border Crisis
description: Assisting with a record flood of people crossing the U.S. southern border strained Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE) resources as the number of deportations conducted by the agency lagged again in fiscal year 2022. title: Police Bringing Cleaning Crew To House Where Four University Of Idaho Students Were Murdered
